title: 7W 3L Bronze 4? ( Ranked )
body: I got Bronze IV... I won 7 games and lost 3. ( 2 - 3 S's in those games ) and I still got Bronze IV. Please explain to me why the ranked system put me lower than I finished last season...

replies.body:
9/10 bronze 4.. yep amazing work riot.

Even OP.GG says my MMR should be br2 at least..

Edit: not as bad as my mid main account, diamond mmr get put into gold 2. GG riot you know how to screw the pooch.
"Main" account, nice joke lol, dw I'm also Diamond elo, everyone here is Diamond

I one trick in mid. I am ashamed as to who i one trick and people hate me in my ELO so i don't post under it nor want to be associated with it because when ever i talk on forums people abuse me.

I am sorry i don't want to post under that account name for your amusement man. Very sorry. 

I am defiantly not amazing by ANY stretch of the imagination. I don't even deserve D mmr or status, but i do play that champion very well and enough to hold my lane so my team can help carry me. If that isn't enough then im sorry.

Still though, 8/10 on main account with that mmr and i get gold is pretty stupid you have to agree.

Last season you ended barely above bronze 3. 
Even after winning 7+/10 placements games, people are lucky if they stay where they are. It's ok, if you keep going with such a good win rate, you will be back to your old rank soon enough :)
Yeah but, Riot should start it all over again... Instead of not being able to get a higher rank then last season...

but I mean even with ending up in a lower rank, it should still approximate the same rank if they do really really well in placements, like if they go 5-5 or worse fair enough if they lose alot in ranks but if they score like 7,8 or 9 out of 10 ranked placements they should probably be placed in a similar elo to the elo they left last season.

Personally I'm preparing my main new main champions for when I decide to do ranked soon and I am looking forward to the challenge of climbing for once rather than being placed too high by a previous placements and then just feeding every single ranked game.

For me being moved into low bronze will probably be a good thing in terms of self esteem (because silver made me feel so boosted because I was definitely not up to scratch and I was deadweight in ranked matches) and personal improvement at league. That said veterans of the game, especially those above gold should still have a bit more credit for their previous rank.
i won 8/10 and landed on b3... i don't mind really, just means i gotta work harder to get back my ranking and surpass it. I'd like to think of it as more practice.

> While the preseason was shorter this year than ever before, your 2017 ranked adventure will begin with a fresh set of ten placement matches in both Solo/Duo and Flex. Your preseason ratings influence where you’ll land, but most of you should expect to start your climb lower than where you finished last season.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2017-ranked-season-kicks

This is a soft reset of your mmr, and is not any different from previous seasons. Pretty much everyone starts lower than their end of season rank.
Cause you were Bronze last season as well and they take last seasons MMR into account for this season...duh

I was in silver 3 during the pre-season and bronze 4 end of last season. Then I forgot about the previsional reset, I went 6-4 and thought I was going to bronze 1-2. But, I stayed in Silver 3, so I'm happy but confused with the rank system.
i won 7/10 and got put in bronze 4 too lol

why even bother having placements in the first place? why don;t they just reset rank each season and go from there?
personally I'm pissed because i won 8 out of 10 and got bronze 5 .. so really please tell me... whats the point of having placements? all it does is poison the community, people are going to be tilted for weeks, i just played with a draven before who was so tilted from getting bronze 5 that he fed.......
all placements have done is build up everyones hopes and dash them like nothing, even worse is when someone who only wins 3 games out of ten gets placed into silver? serious issues here riot
